text: Imiterere y’Ijuru ryasezeranyijwe abagandukira Allah (ni uko) ritembamo imigezi y’amazi adahindura impumuro n’uburyohe, imigezi y’amata atajya ahindura uburyohe, imigezi y’inzoga ziryoheye abanywi (zidasindisha), ndetse n’imigezi y’ubuki busukuye; kandi bateganyirijwemo buri bwoko bw’imbuto no kubabarirwa na Nyagasani wabo. Ese abo bameze kimwe nk’abazaba mu muriro ubuziraherezo, bahabwa amazi yatuye abacagagura amara
